description: Try our easy to follow Chicken & Tarragon Burgers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken & Tarragon Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g boneless, skinless chicken breasts, roughly chopped
1 handful rocket leaves, tossed in lemon juice (to serve)
0.5 small red chilli, finely chopped (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Place the chicken in a food processor and whizz until smooth. Transfer to a bowl, add the mustard, tarragon and chilli and season well with pepper. Mix together until well blended, then shape into 4 patties.

Lay the chicken burgers on a grill rack lined with foil and cook under a preheated high grill for 45 minutes on each side until browned and cooked through. Split the buns and place, cut-side up, under the grill for the final 1 minute of cooking time.
Place a hot burger on the top of each warm bun base and top with a spoonful of béarnaise sauce and a handful of lemon juicedressed rocket. Cover with the warm bun tops and serve immediately.
